name: mimiai ad blocker
css:
@-moz-document regexp(".*mimi.*.com"),domain("mimione.com") {
div.spaceborder[style="width: 99%"],
div[align=center],
table[id],
table[width='666'],
table[width='760'],
table[width='99%'],
.t_infoline,
.mainheader,
.footerline,
.tableborder,
.altbg1,
.t_user,
.t_msg tr:first-child,
.header,br,
.subtable:not(:last-child),
.subtable.option,
.t_msgfont img + br,
.spaceborder[style="width: 99%; border-bottom: none"]
{display:none}
form .spaceborder,
.t_msgfont br,
.subtable.nav
{display:block}
tr.category>td
{visibility:hidden}
}
